about_the_game:
Stick, stretch, squish and slide your slimes to raid the Harpy Empire in Harpy Raiders, an outlandish role-playing platformer. Balance international opinion, the masses' clamoring for vengeance and your own personal conscience in a sky-spanning crusade to take back what is rightfully yours.

Raid the Harpies

The harpies, half-bird half-man scourge of the skies, have long plagued the slime race. Emboldened by recent slime losses, the harpies once again move against their foe. Now, it is up to you and your slimes to face down this feathery menace and raid their every stronghold!

Build up the Slime Army

Long gone are the days where slimes are mindless blobs. Cast magic and field air power. Recruit the strange and the exotic - from flowery Geo Belhs to a literal rock. Mix, match, expend and replace your personnel as you see fit for each mission. With a will of steel and command over countless conscripts, nothing is impossible.

A Campaign of Vengeance

Fight in the scenic sky islands, seat of the perfidious Harpy Empire. In a world where actions have consequences, balance public opinion against the Harpies. Let the world know there is no space for the winged puppets of neocolonial humanity!



And remember, good soldiers follow orders.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8/8.1, 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel 3rd generation Core (Ivy Bridge) or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce MX 350
  • Additional Notes: Game currently needs Vulkan capable graphics card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10

short_description: Stick, stretch, squish and slide your way as a slime soldier raiding the Harpy Empire in Harpy Raiders, an outlandish role-playing platformer. Maybe cause some humanitarian catastrophes along the way. Glory to the Slime Army!
